s.text: It hasn't gotten nearly the attention that Mike Lind's book has, but A Better War deserves strong consideration by anyone still interested in Vietnam.
The creation of a giant gulag in Vietnam that was euphemistically referred to as "re-education camps."
Jim, I'd recommend a different book, one I've mentioned before.
Jim, I'd recommend a different book, one I've mentioned before.

We disagree on whether the price of keeping South Vietnam out of North Vietnam's control was worth paying--or even if there was a price that might have been politically acceptable in the United States in the early 1970s.
